## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/foldingset">FoldingSet</a> - This template class is used to instantiate a specialized implementation of the folding set to the node class T.

T must be a subclass of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a368e3de8ea854f34bc97c21a64d6a164">FoldingSetNode</a> and implement a Profile function.

Note that this set type is movable and move-assignable. However, its moved-from state is not a valid state for anything other than move-assigning and destroying. This is primarily to enable movable APIs that incorporate these objects.

Definition at line 536 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/foldingset-h">FoldingSet.h</a>.
